Gift to President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Gift to President Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A Polish delegation for the study of the Juche idea presented a gift to President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 It was conveyed to an official concerned by head of the visiting delegation Jacek Poniewierski.

Sixth Kimilsungia Festival Hall Visited
articles.content:
Sixth Kimilsungia Festival Hall Visited 
    Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Sixth Kimilsungia Festival Hall yesterday to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
 At the end of the visit Evelio Duenas Ponce, commercial councilor of the Cuban embassy, who is doyen of the corps wrote in the visitor's book that seeing immortal Kimilsungias in full bloom, he came to have a better understanding of the humble reverence of the progressives for President Kim Il Sung and the President is always with the Korean people.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received floral baskets from a delegation of the Secretariat of the International Institute of the Juche Idea led by Deputy Director Sakae Araki, a delegation of the National Liaison Council of Japan Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Secretary General Fujio Hanawa and a delegation of the National Liaison Council of Japan Societies for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il led by Kazushige Morita on a visit to the DPRK to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
 The floral baskets were conveyed to an official concerned by the secretary general of the National Liaison Council of Japan Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea yesterday.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Heads of Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Heads of Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations
    Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today met and had a friendly talk with Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), Sakae Araki, deputy secretary general of the IIJI, and heads of delegations of Juche idea study organizations of different countries on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
 Present were Kim Yong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Society, and officials concerned.
